column4: <soundray> Math^: Pixma printers tend to not work, unless you buy a driver from Turboprint. This may change in feisty. Still, go for an HP printer if you can -- better support. <== Personal experience says some pixma printers CAN be made to work, but mine couldn't, so I bought a cheap HP laser printer.
They're not using httpd.conf in the default ubuntu installs anymore, it's /etc/apache2/sites-enabled/*, with the default in 000-default
ah ok, I haven't used a webserver running on ubuntu for ages :-)
No problem, just letting you know
